name: FlandersBio VZW
goal: Cluster voor life sciences en health bedrijven in Vlaanderen en onmiddellijk omringende gebieden inclusief grote bedrijven, SME's en onderzoeksinstellingen
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Development, Education, Enterprise, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Food Safety, Internal Market, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
rare disease policies, pharmaceutical dossiers and use of biotechnology in health care
Research and Innovation policy, in particular - EU Horizon 2020 and the Key Enabling Technologies
COSME; Regional policy (Smart Specialisation Platform)
Industrial policy including SMEs
Activities in the policy areas of agriculture and legislations relevant for crop protection products, biotechnology and seeds.
Nutrition - Food
Bio-based economy
